sound_stereo_output.command: pactl list sinks | grep 'Active Port' | sed 's/\t//g'

sound_stereo_desc.command: pactl list sinks | grep -A 10 'Name:.*@DEFAULT_SINK@' | grep -m 1 'Description:' | cut -d ':' -f2 | tr -d '\t\n\r'

sound_stereo_driver.command: pactl list sinks | grep -A 10 'Name:.*@DEFAULT_SINK@' | grep -m 1 'Driver:' | cut -d ':' -f2 | tr -d '\t\n\r'

sound_mic.command: pactl list sources | awk -v RS='' '/State: RUNNING/ && /Description:.*[Mm]icrophone/ {gsub(/.*Description: /, ""); print}' | head -n 1

sound_mic_driver.command: pactl list sinks | grep -m 1 'Driver:' | cut -d ':' -f2 | tr -d '\t\n\r'

sound_mic_detail.command: pactl info | grep 'Default Source' | cut -d ' ' -f3 | tr -d '\t\n\r'

sound_mic_volume.command: volume=$(pactl list sources | grep -A 15 "$(pactl info | grep 'Default Source' | cut -d ' ' -f3)" | grep 'Volume:' | head -1 | tr -d '\t\n\r'); if [ -z "$volume" ]; then echo 'available'; else echo "$volume"; fi

webcam_info.command: bash -c "lsusb | grep -iE 'webcam|Integrated Camera' | head -n 1 | awk -F':' '{print substr(\$3, 5)}' | sed 's/Technology/Tech./g' | sed 's/Corporation/Corp./g' | sed 's/Integrated/Integr./g' | cut -c 1-35"

net_interface.command: nmcli -t -f DEVICE,TYPE,STATE dev status | head -n 100 | tr '\n' ' ' | cut -c 1-1000

net_wifi_status.command: nmcli -t -f TYPE,STATE dev status | grep wifi

net_wifi_strength.command: nmcli -f IN-USE,SIGNAL dev wifi | grep '^\*' | awk '{print $2}'

power_connection_type.command: if [ -z "$(upower -e | grep 'BAT')" ]; then echo 'AC Power'; else upower -i $(upower -e | grep 'BAT') | grep 'state' | awk '{print $2}'; fi

power_level.command: if [ -z "$(upower -e | grep 'BAT')" ]; then echo 'N/A'; else upower -i $(upower -e | grep 'BAT') | grep 'percentage' | awk '{print $2}'; fi

apps_top.command: ps aux --sort=-%cpu | head -n 21 | awk '{print $11}' | tail -n 20 | tr '\n' ',' | sed 's/,$//' | awk '{print "["$0"]"}'

audio_3_5mm_activity.command: if pactl list sinks | grep -A 1 'Active Port' | grep -q 'analog-output'; then echo 'active'; else echo 'inactive'; fi

audio_hdmi_activity.command: if pactl list sinks | grep -A 1 'Active Port' | grep -q 'hdmi-output'; then echo 'active'; else echo 'inactive'; fi
